description: Demolition of existing buildings and change of use/redevelopment of the site to provide 58 residential units comprising 18 dwellinghouses and 40 flats in buildings ranging between 2 and 4 storeys in height together with the provision of 75 car parking spaces, associated landscaping works including the provision of private gardens and communal amenity space, revised access arrangements, cycle parking and refuse and recycling storage.
